project_categories.name: All Projects
project_categories.desc:
All projects that are done since the beginning of my study in computer science. Many
            programming languages have been studied and practiced especially Python, Java, JavaScript, SQL, and C.
            These are sorted by development date. You can choose to filter based on the categories in the tab on 
            the left/above.
            
            Repos that are tagged with 'Archived' are repos that were not maintain in git. Thus, git commits
            in these repos are not as meaningful as the other.

project_categories.name: Machine Learning
project_categories.desc:
Machine learning is my main focus of study because I am majoring in Data Science. I am interested
            in modelling for unstructured data such as images, text, and audio. All implementations of machine
            learning are mostly done in Python using Keras library.

project_categories.name: Web
project_categories.desc:
Web development was one of the tasks given during the duration of my internship period. I have
            learnt to use bootstrap and jquery for designing the front-end. I have also been involving in backend
            web development using vanilla PHP and Node.js Express package.

project_categories.name: Command Line
project_categories.desc:
Command line application is very useful because I can reuse the application in another program.
            Some of the command line applications are the API that I program for preprocessing of data.

projects.name: Java Midi Reader
projects.description:
This is a command line tool that helps to translate midi note from single track. 
    It converts midi to simple csv and re-converts supported csv to midi of one track using simple
    command line instruction.

projects.name: Food Self-Service Ordering System
projects.description:
This web-app food ordering system enables customer to choose seat whenever available, and prompts
    takeaway when there are no seat available. This interactive system requires one server and at least one client
    system to communicate between the database for seat administrating and food ordering at the same time. Payments
    is made right after the ordering is done.

projects.name: Word Counter using MPI
projects.description:
The word counter is done parallelly within a cluster of system controlled by MPI. To measure
    effectiveness, the word counter program is both run in a single system and the cluster of system, and the 
    computation time is calculated. Time taken using POSIX threading implementation is also taken for comparisons.

projects.name: Image Classification on Satellite Images
projects.description:
Implementation of CNN using Keras on dataset of 12-classes and 45-classes images. Dataset is 
    obtained and derived from ******. Implementation training took approximately 12 hours, and the accuracy on 12-classes
    45-classes images are 83% and 61%, respectively.
